author: Joshua Caplan, Joshua Caplan
title: Ezekiel Emanuel: 'We Cannot Return to Normal Until There's a Vaccine,' Could Be 12-18 Months
description: Dr. Ezekiel Emanuel, an architect of Obamacare and special adviser to the director-general of the World Health Organization, told MSNBC's "The Last Word" that the United States cannot return to normal until a Chinese coronavirus vaccine is available, which he…
